alert.note: Alert for Falls; Freestone; Hill; Limestone; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 11:55AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern McLennan, western Freestone, Limestone, southeastern Hill, northern Falls and southern Navarro Counties through 1245 PM CST... At 1155 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hubbard to 6 miles south of Golinda. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hubbard, Riesel, Golinda, Hallsburg, Navarro Mills Lake, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, and Lake Creek Lake around 1200 PM CST. Marlin, Mart, and Dawson around 1205 PM CST. Coolidge around 1210 PM CST. Angus and Lake Mexia around 1220 PM CST. Corsicana, Mexia, Wortham, Navarro, Fort Parker State Park, and Richland-Chambers Reservoir around 1225 PM CST. Groesbeck around 1230 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Watt, Fallon, Mooreville, Streetman, Richland, Asa, Prairie Hill, Mildred, Perry, and Thornton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 328 and 341. Interstate 45 between mile markers 200 and 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
